dct_title_s: Colton's map of the United States, the Canadas & c : showing the rail roads, canals & stage roads with distances from place to place
dct_description_sm: Printed by D. McLellan.; Inset maps of New England and eastern New York; United States and Central America; the Isthmus of Panama showing the routes of travel between Chagres and Panama.
